title.value: Сравнительное изучение и эколого-биологические особенности лобелии Дортмана (Lobelia Dortmanna) при реинтродукции
Comparative research and ecological-and-biological features of Lobelia dortmanna within reintroduction

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Biological Series

person.name: Morozov, I.M., Vitebsk State Univ. named after P.M.Masherov (Belarus)

abstract.value: Anthropogenic activity directly influences biodiversity of the natural plant formation. Experimental researches aimed on the creation of artificial populations of the rare plant species in natural conditions appear on the most important actions of the natural biodiversity preservation and plant world conservation. Lobelia Dortmanna L. represents a plant variety, included in the Red Book of the Republic of Belarus and protected plant of neighboring countries. With the aim of the research and preservation of the Lobelia Dortmanna in 2003 the investigation of the population of the disappearing plant is carried out in two lakes of the Republic of Belarus. Ten years experiment allows analyzing the efficiency of the technology of conservation of the Lobelia Dortmanna variety. The scheme of lakes' healing over with the plants is presented; dynamics of the change of leaves' rosettes in artificial population is analyzed.  The comparative studies of biometrics of vegetative and generative organs of Lobelia Dortmanna in natural and artificial populations in similar environmental conditions and seed production have revealed that the development of the plants in artificial conditions has no essential differences from the development of the plants in natural conditions. It speaks about the successfulness of the reintroduction of the species.
